item.title: 10TP
item.description: 10TP is a European Tier II Light Tank. Player Population This graphs compare’s the tank’s player population by WR at Tier to other same tier Light Tanks. Relative WR vs. Player Skill-level This graphs shows how well players of different skill-level (measured by WR at Tier) perform in the tank vs.
